    • Method Detail

      • preattacks

        public void preattacks​(Combatant current,
                       Combatant target,
                       Attack a,
                       BattleState s)
        Description copied from class: Strike
        Called before any DamageNodes are created. Useful for setting up effects and the like. This is also called only once per AbstractAttack run, making it preferable to Strike.prehit(Combatant, Combatant, Attack, DamageChance, BattleState).
        Specified by:
        preattacks in class Strike

      • postattacks

        public void postattacks​(Combatant current,
                        Combatant target,
                        Attack a,
                        BattleState s)
        Description copied from class: Strike
        Like Strike.posthit(Combatant, Combatant, Attack, DamageChance, BattleState) but for Strike.postattacks(Combatant, Combatant, Attack, BattleState).
        Specified by:
        postattacks in class Strike

      • prehit

        public void prehit​(Combatant active,
                   Combatant target,
                   Attack a,
                   DamageChance dc,
                   BattleState s)
        Description copied from class: Strike
        Called before a strike hits. Mostly used to setup bonus damage, secondary effects, etc. BattleState and Combatants are already cloned. Make sure to clone Combatant.source internally, if necessary. Does not support randomness, so use take-10 rules whenever possible (for saving throws, etc). This is called before Attack.effect is taken into effect (if it is at all).
        Specified by:
        prehit in class Strike
        dc - Make sure to use this to apply extra damage so it will handle death, Monster.dr, etc.

      • posthit

        public void posthit​(Combatant attacker,
                    Combatant target,
                    Attack a,
                    DamageChance dc,
                    BattleState s)
        Description copied from class: Strike
        Called after all damage consequences have been ealt with. Mostly used to clean-up Strike.prehit(Combatant, Combatant, Attack, DamageChance, BattleState) actions.
        Specified by:
        posthit in class Strike
